# contentURL

**Instance Property**

The local location of the downloaded file.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentURL: URL? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is valid only when the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload/downloadState] property is set to [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownloadState/finished]. The URL becomes invalid after the transaction object associated with the download is finalized.

## Accessing a Completed Download

- **error**: The error that prevented the content from being downloaded.
